ecopiapi 0.1.3
  • Reference

Post a new detection

Source: R/api.R
post_detection.Rd

Wrapper around the 'detections_create' endpoint. If you want to create a new detection and include a media file, you need to do it in two steps. First create the detection using post_detection() and then upload the mediafile with patch_detections() TIP: Assigning your own uuid before posting makes it easier to patch a file.

Usage

post_detection(...)

Arguments

...

Find required parameters here https://api.ecopi.de/api/docs/#tag/v0.1/operation/v0.1_detections_create

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
post_detection(
  recorder_name = "000000002e611dde",
  datetime = lubridate::now() |> lubridate::with_tz(tzone = "UTC") |> format("%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S") |> paste0("Z") |> as.character(), # lubridate::now(tzone = "UTC") |> format("%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S%Z") |> as.character(), # "2019-08-24T14:15:22Z",
  start = 1,
  end = 4,
  species_code = "Frosch",
  confidence = -1
)
} # }
